text: Andrej Panadić (born 9 March 1969) is a former Croatian football player. He has played for Yugoslavia's national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Division Apps Goals Dinamo Zagreb 1988–89 First League 28 3 1989–90 30 4 1990–91 18 0 Total 76 7 HAŠK-Građanski 1992 Prva HNL 20 0 Croatia Zagreb 1992–93 Prva HNL 29 3 1993–94 23 4 Total 52 7 Chemnitzer FC 1994–95 2.
